DataElement.preferredDefinition: Approval status at the time the radiotherapy SOP instance was created.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._Approved; established by authority; given authoritative approval._A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
Acceptance as satisfactory by an authoritative body; established by authority; given authoritative approval.
